sourcesContent:
<template>
  <IonList>
    <ChatItem @click="openModal"/>
    <ChatItem @click="openModal"/>
    <ChatItem @click="openModal"/>
  </IonList>
</template>

<script>
/* eslint-disable vue/no-unused-components */
import {
  IonCard,
  IonCardHeader,
  IonCardSubtitle,
  IonCardTitle,
  IonIcon,
  IonCardContent,
  IonList,
  IonItem,
  modalController,
} from '@ionic/vue';
import ChatItem from "@/components/ChatItem.vue";
import ChatModal from '@/menus/ChatModal.vue';

export default {
  name: "ChatSpace",
  setup() {
    return {}
  },
  components: {
    IonCardSubtitle,
    IonIcon,
    IonCard,
    IonCardHeader,
    IonCardTitle,
    IonCardContent,
    IonItem,
    IonList,
    ChatItem
  },
  props: {},
  methods: {
    async openModal() {
      const modal = await modalController.create({
        component: ChatModal,
        componentProps: {
          groupId: this.groupId,
        }
      });
      return await modal.present();
    },
  }
}

</script>

<style scoped>
</style>
